item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

Join me at the Thursday Caribe hotspot for a great night of dancing with SalsaBoston !!

Located up-river from the Hyatt and BU Bridge, adjacent to the MicroCenter and Trader Joe's.

This is An All Ages event
Cash bar
Complementary Appetizers
Coat check (seasonal)
Free Garage & Lot parking and free valet on busy nights. (Please don't park at Trader Joe's. Extra parking available across the street from the hotel entrance.)
Dinner available at Bisuteki Japanese Steakhouse in the Hotel Lobby.

(Regular cover charge: $10; $5/lesson additional)
MEETUP MEMBER DISCOUNT!!!
2-for-1 Special BEFORE 9:00pm if people RSVP
(includes the beginner lesson, but not the latin sampler or intermediate)
OR $8 cover after 9:00pm (RSVP required)

Lessons: 8pm-10pm
Dancing from 10:00-1:30am with Resident DJ's D.Martinez, Hernan, and guests
Dress: Smart Casual


Try to be there by 8:30 so that you could meet the other members of the group. If you get there late, my cell number is 617-435-4233. I will be wearing a black fedora hat, should be easy to find.


See you soon!!

-Angel
Ass. Org.

More info http://salsaboston.co...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Caribe Salsa Thursdays with SalsaBoston !!!!
